com.tractionsoftware.gwt.user.client
Class Viewport

java.lang.Object
  com.tractionsoftware.gwt.user.client.Viewport
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasBlurHandlers, HasFocusHandlers, HasHandlers
public class Viewport
extends java.lang.Object
implements HasFocusHandlers, HasBlurHandlers

Provides a browser Window like object that tracks focus and supports focus and blur events handlers.
